https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5pwOhZM9iYbQyxEX67ja4K1Cyof.jpg A woman falls for a charming and mysterious businessman. The whirlwind romance turns sour when she is framed for his underworld crimes. Now, finally out of prison she is ready for sweet revenge. Ek Hasina Thi
